content:
Snaanam thannilninneyaninyiha ninmeyu rakthangall
Kaikkondoraayu ninnude sharane mrtharaayorkkormma
Bhoosvargangallilekaname aathmaakkallkkaashvaasamathum
/tnaathhaa! Nalkaname.

Aadaamudayonaadaam nandananaadaamin janakan
Thaazhmayodaadatthe sandarshichaan paathaallatthil
Mrthiyeneekki ninakkekum nyaanohariyenna
/trulliyathaam vaagdaanam pole
